body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Ostego County, New York, native. Married Sallie Louise Wheeler Gazlay in Oldham County, Kentucky, on February 11, 1851. Store clerk in Binghamton, New York. Joined the bar in Louisville in 1845. Practiced law in Louisville partnership with Franklin Gorin in 1861.
